# effect

**Instance Property**

The visual effect provided by the view.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var effect: UIVisualEffect? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The effect is either a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBlurEffect] or a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIVibrancyEffect].

## Retrieving view information

- **contentView**: A view object that can have a visual effect view added to it.
